title: Book TV: Noam Chomsky, American Power and the New Mandarins - 40th Anniversary Talk
description: In celebration of the 40th anniversary publication of Noam Chomsky's first political book, "American Power and the New Mandarins," the Brecht Forum held a benefit event at Riverside Church in New York City.  During the talk, Professor Chomsky spoke about current events around the world.  He was introduced by Amy Goodman, host of Pacifica Radio's "Democracy Now!"
